document_data.mainbody: King Dorglor was the eleventh Obarskyr monarch and a king of Cormyr. He was born in the Year of the Quirt, 110 DR, the second son of Sacrast Obarskyr and began his rule after the death of this brother Daravvan in the Year of the Biting Frost, 124 DR. His reign ended when he took his own life in the Year of the Impassable Chasm, 134 DR.
